summary: A memorandum from a Cook Supervisor at the Metropolitan Correctional Center regarding authorization to feed inmate Jeffrey Epstein meals in the attorney conference room on July 23, 2019. The supervisor clarifies they never stated their supervisor instructed them to feed Epstein there.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The inmate being fed meals in the attorney conference room at the Metropolitan Correctional Center.

persons.name: Cook Supervisor
persons.context: Author of the memorandum who clarifies they never stated their supervisor instructed them to feed inmate Epstein in the attorney conference room.

persons.name: Food Service Administrator
persons.context: Recipient of the memorandum regarding the authorization to feed meals to inmate Epstein.

connections.description: Cook Supervisor was involved in feeding inmate Epstein meals in the attorney conference room.

events.title: Feeding Epstein in Attorney Conference Room
events.description: Inmate Jeffrey Epstein was fed meals inside the attorney conference room at the Metropolitan Correctional Center.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, New York 10007
Attorney Conference Room (within Metropolitan Correctional Center)
keyFacts: On July 23, 2019, inmate Jeffrey Epstein was being fed meals inside the attorney conference room at the Metropolitan Correctional Center.
The Cook Supervisor clarifies in writing that they never stated their supervisor instructed them to feed Epstein in the attorney conference room.
The document is a formal memorandum regarding authorization for this feeding arrangement.
